hints.content:
Now, let's use a place value chart to write $5{,}704$ in expanded form.

Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$\tealD5$ | $\maroonD7$ | $0$ | $\greenD4$

$5{,}704=\tealD{5{,}000}+\maroonD{700}+\greenD{4}$

Now, let's break our number into parts to write it in word form:
$\goldD{5}{,}\blueD{704}$

$\goldD{\text{Five thousand}}$ is to the left of the comma. 

 $\blueD{\text{Seven hundred four}}$ is to the right of the comma.

If we combine the parts, we write $5{,}704$ as five thousand, seven hundred four.

This is the completed chart:

Standard Form | Word Form | Expanded Form
- | - | -
$5{,}704$ | Five thousand, seven hundred four | ${5{,}000}+{700}+4$
